translation: Prosseguir para a próxima missão?{#Name=" "}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}

translation: Todos se reunem em um lugar de demonstração{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: Hm? Ah, você quer saber mais sobre mim?{LF}Bem, eu sou exatamente o que pareço!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Hm? Oh, you wanna know more about me?{LF}Well, I'm exactly what I seem!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Um belo exemplo de homem.{#Name="Cent"}
source: A fine, beautiful example of a man.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Eu acho que meu bom looks frequentemente desanimam as pessoas pequenas,{LF}mas o que você pode fazer?{#Name="Cent"}
source: I find my good looks often turn off the little people,{LF}but what can you do?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Posso socar ele? Tipo, no rosto?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Can I punch him? Like, in the face?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Oh, sim! Falando em socar... é hora do trivia!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh, yes! Speaking of punching...it's trivia time!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Você já ouviu a expressão "virar a outra face", sim?{#Name="Cent"}
source: You've heard the expression "turn the other cheek," yes?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Bem, não é apenas uma expressão!{LF}Oh meu, não.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Weeell, it's not just an expression!{LF}Oh my, no.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Na verdade, vem de um texto médico antigo sobre{LF}como ajustar linhas de mandíbula e estruturas ósseas!{#Name="Cent"}
source: It actually comes from an ancient medical text concerning{LF}how to adjust jaw lines and bone structures!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Uh, realmente?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Uh, really?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Claro que não. Ele está cheio de merda.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Of course not. He's full of shit.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Vamos, só um soco!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Come on, just one punch!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Bem? Estamos prontos para a grande partida?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Well? We ready for the big departure?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Hmm... Como é estranho. Não consigo parar de tremer.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Hmm... How odd. I can't seem to stop shaking.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: O que há de errado? Nervoso?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's wrong? Nervous?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Tão vergonhoso quanto é admitir...{#Name="Octa"}
source: As shameful as it is to admit...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Mas você sabe, minha senhora, os médicos dizem que uma noite apaixonada de{LF}entupimento de madeira é a cura perfeita para esses males! Mmm?{#Name="Octa"}
source: But you know, my lady, doctors say a passionate night of{LF}log-jamming is the perfect cure for such ailments! Mmm?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Esqueça.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Forget it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Então me dê três dias, você?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Then give me three days, would you?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Eu preciso de 72 horas seguidas de prazer próprio antes{LF}de estar pronto para o combate.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I need 72 straight hours of self-pleasure before{LF}I'm ready for combat.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Não. Não vai acontecer.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nope. Not happening.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Pronto para ir? Oh ho ho ho!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ready to go yet? Oh ho ho ho!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Cara, essa tripulação está ficando fora de controle.{LF}Todo mundo está falando-falando-falando o tempo todo.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Man, this crew's getting outta hand.{LF}Everyone's all yap-yap-yap all the freakin' time.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Eu pessoalmente gosto da companhia.{LF}Eu acho... animada.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I personally enjoy the companionship.{LF}I find it...lively.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Animada? Tudo o que faz é tornar-nos mais propensos a serem vistos{LF}por algum monstro!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Lively? All it does is make us more likely to be spotted{LF}by some monster!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Desde que Lady Zero esteja segura, nada mais importa.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: So long as Lady Zero is safe, nothing else matters.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Oh, agora eu entendi. Você só quer dar a Zero{LF}alguns escudos de carne a mais, huh?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, now I get it. You just wanna give Zero{LF}a few more meat-shields, huh?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Mais discípulos significa mais pessoas para ela abusar.{LF}É assim que é, espetáculo?{#Name="Dito"}
source: More disciples means more people for her to abuse.{LF}That how it is, freakshow?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Amizades falsas me dão nojo.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Pretend friendships make me sick.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nossa jornada se tornou longa mesmo.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Our journey has become long indeed.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Eu sempre soube que seria assim.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I always knew it would.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Claro, minha senhora. Coisas assim só você poderia ter previsto.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Of course, my lady. Such things only you could have foreseen.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Eu oro para que você desfrute de um sono profundo e restaurador esta noite.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I pray you enjoy a deep and restful sleep tonight.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Eu permanecerei ao seu lado e a guardarei{LF}de qualquer coisa que possa ocorrer.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I shall remain by your side and guard you{LF}from whatever may occur.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Certo. Vou fazer o meu melhor.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Right. I'll do my best.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Eu sou seu para comandar, minha senhora.{LF}Eu farei qualquer coisa que você deseje.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I am yours to command, my lady.{LF}I shall do anything you desire.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Tem apenas uma irmã left, huh, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: There's just one sister left, huh, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Finalmente reduzido a Uma.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Finally down to One.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Então você vai matá-la agora, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So I guess you're gonna kill her now, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Você tem um problema com isso?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You got a problem with that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: É só que...nós matamos muitas pessoas agora, você sabe?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It's just that...we've killed a lot of people now, you know?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: E?{#Name="Zero"}
source: And?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Bem, quando eu tento dormir, às vezes eu...{LF}Eu ainda posso ouvir eles gritando.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, when I try to sleep, sometimes I...{LF}I can still hear them screaming.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Você, Zero? Você ouve eles gritando?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Do you, Zero? Do you hear them scream?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Não, eu não.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No, I don't.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Nossa, Zero. Você é muito forte.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Wow, Zero. You sure are strong.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Vamos matar novamente...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: We're going to kill again...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Vamos?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shall we?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady One's in the Cathedral City, which is protected{LF}by a strong defensive network.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady One's in the Cathedral City, which is protected{LF}by a strong defensive network.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Thus, I believe an aerial invasion would be our best strategy.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Thus, I believe an aerial invasion would be our best strategy.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Huh. Well, at least you're good for something.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Huh. Well, at least you're good for something.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But my lady, you already know that I'm of great use{LF}during these long, dark nights!{#Name="Octa"}
source: But my lady, you already know that I'm of great use{LF}during these long, dark nights!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: ははっ……{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ははっ……{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: So...we're fighting again?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So...we're fighting again?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yep.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yep.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Okay...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Okay...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hang on to me, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hang on to me, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Shall we?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shall we?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady One's in the Cathedral City, which is protected{LF}by a strong defensive network.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady One's in the Cathedral City, which is protected{LF}by a strong defensive network.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Thus, I believe an aerial invasion would be our best strategy.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Thus, I believe an aerial invasion would be our best strategy.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Huh. Well, at least you're good for something.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Huh. Well, at least you're good for something.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But my lady, you already know that I'm of great use{LF}during these long, dark nights!{#Name="Octa"}
source: But my lady, you already know that I'm of great use{LF}during these long, dark nights!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Heh.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Então...nós estamos brigando novamente?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So...we're fighting again?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: É.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yep.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ok...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Okay...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Se agarre a mim, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hang on to me, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}
